com.intowow.sdk

Class FlipADDeferHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intowow.sdk.FlipADDeferHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener, com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener

    public class FlipADDeferHelper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.intowow.sdk.interfaces.ADHelperListener, android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.OnPageChangeListener
    this class helps the APP to request the Flip splash ad easily. it is request by deferring
